snippet: Mayor Michael Bloomberg and Speaker Christine Quinn should pass a bill that requires employers to provide sick leave for workers.
abstract: Editorial urges Mayor Michael R Bloomberg of New York and Speaker Christine Quinn to drop their opposition, or come up with a reasonable compromise, to a proposed City Council bill that would require employers to provide paid sick leave for their workers.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael Bloomberg and Speaker Christine Quinn should pass a bill that requires employers to provide sick leave for workers.

headline.seo: Sick Leave Policy for New York City
